subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Marin Cilic reached his first Grand Slam semifinal in four years. Bob and Mike Bryan are in the men’s doubles final, and Martina Hingis advanced to the women’s doubles final with Flavia Pennetta.
snippet: Marin Cilic reached his first Grand Slam semifinal in four years. Bob and Mike Bryan are in the men’s doubles final, and Martina Hingis advanced to the women’s doubles final with Flavia Pennetta.
